topics.body:
So I noticed something interesting while watching Digimon.
[spoiler]The first time Tai and Koromon return to the human world the animation changes a lot. There's a lot more detail on small things like hand movements and posing. But the most notable change is the color pallate. In the Digital World the colors are bright and cartoonish, but the first time in the human world the color pallate more dull and washed-out. Giving a visual sense of realism.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
